QuestData.Title: Saberon Population Reduction
QuestData.Description: We are closer to our goals but a host of sharp toothed saberon bar our way.$b$bIf we are to get anywhere up here, some of the more aggressive ones will need to be put down I think.
QuestData.RewardText: Many are finding bolt-holes to weather your storm, friend. That should keep them out of our way.
